title: Behind The Idea #82: Picking Through Pharma Pressures, With Ed Silverman
description: We speak with Ed Silverman, a longtime follower of the industry who has run the blog Pharmalot for over a decade. Now on StatNews, he joins us to share his insight on the industry and the pressures its facing, and to follow up on our discussion on Walgreens from two weeks ago to see how these pressures might affect the company.
itunes:title: Picking Through Pharma Pressures, With Ed Silverman
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We talk with a pharmaceutical industry expert to better understand the pushes and pulls happening today.
